column1: in memory of robert donnestad -- keeney & basford p. a. funeral home| first: last: born: december 28
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:keeney & basford p. a. funeral homefrederick
column12: joining the lord in heaven. he was 75. originally from new jersey
column13: bob was a 1962 graduate of wheaton college in illinois. he worked in the information services division of general electric until his retirement. during his career with ge
column14: he and his family had the opportunity to live in tokyo
column15: japan and travel the world. throughout his retirement
column16: bob enjoyed volunteering at rappahannock general hospital
column18: and spending time with his family and dogs. he is survived by his wife of 51 years
column20: daughters lorel scott (joe) and cindy roberts (mike)
column22: and several nieces and nephews. memorial service will be private. memorial donations may be made to: northern neck free health clinic in kilmarnock
